alert.note: Alert for Bay; Midland; Saginaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 09 at 3:24PM EDT until May 09 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * Winds...Southeast 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * Humidity...As low as 25 percent. * Temperatures...In the low to mid 70s. * Impacts...Burn restrictions are in effect across parts of the Saginaw Valley. For more information on burn restrictions visit the Michigan DNR website at www.michigan.gov/burnpermit or call 866-922-2876.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now or will shortly. The combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior. Be careful with any activities that could potentially lead to a wildfire. Camping...outdoor grills...smoking materials...chain saws...and all terrain vehicles all have the potential to throw a spark and ignite a dangerous and destructive fire.
